column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: At 2:10 pm on December 1
column5: a Chinese man went on a rampage along 432 Boeung Trabek Street
column8: who is believed to have been high on drugs
column9: caused damage to property and injured several people.------Intial reports suggest that police
column10: as well as members of the public were wounded in the incident.------More to follow.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/391840
